SEARCH
Package gw.api.email

Class Email

java.lang.Object
gw.api.email.Email
public class Email extends Object
Class representing an emailto be sent by the system to be used by the email related plugins

  • Constructor Details

    • Email

      public Email()
      Create an empty email object. The sender and reply to will be set to use current user

    • Email

      public Email(Contact recipient, Contact sender, String subject, String body)
      Create an email object with the provided information
      Parameters:
      recipient - Receipient of the email
      sender - Sender of the email
      subject - Subject of the email
      body - Content of the email

      sender - Sender of the email

      body - Content of the email

      replyTo - Reply to

  • Method Details

    • getBccRecipients

      public List<EmailContact> getBccRecipients()
      BCC recipients. This method returns the original list instead of a copy so the caller can modify the list directly
      Returns:
      BCC recipients

    • setBccRecipients

      public void setBccRecipients(List<EmailContact> bccRecipients)
      Set BCC recipients. The method saves the reference to the list passed in so that the caller can keep updating it
      Parameters:
      bccRecipients - the recipients for BCC

    • addBccRecipient

      public List<EmailContact> getCcRecipients()

      the CC list of the email

      Parameters:
      ccRecipients - The CC list for the email
